title: FTX's Sam Bankman-Fried Charged With Criminal Fraud, Conspiracy
description: U.S. prosecutors, in an indictment unsealed Tuesday, accused the crypto exchange’s founder of a scheme to defraud customers and his hedge fund’s lenders.

title: Tesla Investors Voice Concern Over Elon Musk's Focus on Twitter
description: Supporters of both Tesla and Musk have been asking questions about who is running the electric-vehicle maker.

title: Fusion Breakthrough Accelerates Quest to Unlock Limitless Energy Source
description: The Energy Department said a controlled fusion reaction at a federal research facility produced more energy than it consumed, a milestone in transforming fusion into a practical source of clean energy.

title: States Demand Mature-Content Rating for TikTok
description: A group of 15 attorneys general demanded that Google and Apple strip the video-sharing app of a rating that classifies it as appropriate for teens.

title: Instagram Challenges BeReal and Adds Notes Feature
description: With fresh ways to connect with friends, is Instagram trying to be Instagram again?

title: India's Manufacturing Push Takes an Audacious Gamble on Chips
description: With generous incentives and help from Taiwan’s Foxconn, India is hoping to kick-start a chip fab industry.

title: EU Advances Its Data-Flow Deal After U.S. Makes Surveillance Changes
description: Brussels gives tentative approval to U.S. surveillance-rule changes, as part of pending deal to allow businesses to transfer European data across the Atlantic.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Led Yearslong Fraud at FTX, SEC Says
description: The FTX founder diverted customer funds from the start of his cryptocurrency exchange to support his hedge fund, Alameda Research, the regulator said in a lawsuit filed Tuesday.

title: YouTube Stars Cash In Video Rights for Millions of Dollars
description: Investors are scooping up rights to back catalogs of top YouTubers, betting they will increase in value as creators build bigger audiences.

title: Elon Musk's Twitter Disbands Trust and Safety Council
description: The role of the coalition that worked with Twitter before Mr. Musk took ownership of the company had become unclear.

title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested in Bahamas
description: The arrest occurred in the Bahamas after the U.S. filed criminal charges. Bankman-Fried was scheduled to testify Tuesday before Congress in a hearing probing the collapse of the cryptocurrency exchange but is no longer expected to appear.

title: Twitter Reintroduces Upgraded Subscription Service
description: The relaunch of Twitter Blue is central to Elon Musk’s goal of reducing the social platform’s reliance on advertising dollars.
